336933.「<pc>さん 異界に続く扉からの\n 声を聞いて 来てくださったのですね。\n:
You came here because you heard a voice coming from the door to the Otherworld, yes?
Just as suspected, the voice appears to belong to the creator of this world...
If you decide to proceed forward, know that you'll inevitably have to face this world's creator in battleーKing Godwyn.
Please be sure that you're well prepared.

336934.「この先に進めば 異界の創造主\n 皇帝ガナサダイとの戦いは 避けられません。\:
If you decide to proceed forward, know that you'll inevitably have to face this world's creator in battleーKing Godwyn.
Please be sure that you're well prepared.

336935.<speed=0>\n今の仲間と共に パーティ同盟を組んで\nこの先に 進みます:
<speed=0>
Continue onward by forming a party
alliance alongside your companions?
<select_mem>
Search for Allies
Don't Form Alliance
<select_end>
<close>

336936.<speed=0>\nパーティ同盟を組むと\n今のパーティの 先頭にいる仲間だけ:
<speed=0>
When forming a party alliance, only your
companion in the first party slot will
participate in battle.

336937.<speed=0>\nパーティ同盟を組まずに\n今のパーティメンバー全員で 挑戦:
<speed=0>
You will go to battle with your current
companions and without forming a party
alliance.

338342.「どうやら ガナサダイは 異界のどこかに\n 身を 潜めてしまったようです。\n:
It appears Godwyn has taken refuge in some
other world. If he's to appear here again,
please defeat him once more!

339936.「ガナサダイを倒すには 多くのチカラが\n 必要になるでしょう。そこで この控え:
You'll need a great deal of strength if you hope to defeat Godwyn. That's why I've invited other adventurers who are waiting here.
For battles with 8 people, a party alliance consisting of 4 adventurers and 4 Otherworld companions will be formed.
When forming a party alliance, you'll want to choose in advance which one of your companions you want to come along with you.
The other 3 adventurers can either be found automatically, or you can form an alliance with a specified party.
There are no vocation or item restrictions. Be sure to fully prepare your equipment beforehand, though.
Also, please keep in mind that both you and your companion's level will need to be at least 130 to participate in this battle.
If you're victorious, you might just be rewarded with something special. Why not see what it is for yourself?

339937.「同盟を組まずに ご自身と異界のなかま３人で\n 異界の創造主に挑むことも 可能:
You may also go to battle with just you and 3 of your Otherworld companions.
Do note that the battle will be quite difficult, though. Be sure to choose your companions carefully.
The rewards are the same as if you formed a party alliance. Don't push yourself too hard!

339938.「同盟を組んで挑む際は 異界のなかまを\n ひとりしか 同行させられません。\n:
When challenging with a party alliance, you may only have one of your Otherworld companions accompany you.
Please be sure to set your party in advance to bring the companion you wish to come along.
If you choose not to form an alliance, then you can simply use 3 companions as you would normally.

339963.「何について ご説明しましょう？\n<break>:
What would you like me to explain?
<break>
